name: Wix
description: Wix offers a versatile website builder platform with customizable templates and drag-and-drop simplicity, ideal for personal and small business websites.

name: Squarespace
description: Squarespace provides beautiful templates and an all-in-one solution for building professional websites, blogs, and online stores.

name: WordPress
description: WordPress is a powerful content management system known for its flexibility and vast plugin ecosystem, making it a top choice for blogs and complex websites.

name: Shopify
description: Shopify offers an easy-to-use ecommerce platform that allows anyone to set up an online store and sell their products.

name: Adobe XD
description: Adobe XD is a powerful tool for designing and prototyping user experiences for web and mobile apps.

name: Mailchimp
description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform that helps you manage and talk to your clients, customers, and other interested parties.

name: Canva
description: Canva is a graphic design platform, used to create social media graphics, presentations, posters, documents, and other visual content.

name: HubSpot
description: HubSpot offers a full platform of marketing, sales, customer service, and CRM software — plus the methodology, resources, and support — to help businesses.

name: Zendesk
description: Zendesk is a service-first CRM company that builds software designed to improve customer relationships.

name: Figma
description: Figma is a cloud-based design tool that is similar to Sketch in functionality and features, but with big differences that make Figma better for team collaboration.

name: Asana
description: Asana is a web and mobile application designed to help teams organize, track, and manage their work.

name: Slack
description: Slack is a messaging app for businesses that connects people to the information they need, offering features like channels, direct messages, and integrations with other tools.

name: GitHub
description: GitHub is a platform for version control and collaboration, allowing multiple people to work on projects simultaneously.
